translation.en: Doc, how pleased are you with Tiger King's depiction of you?
translation.es: Doc, ¿está satisfecho con la descripciónque Tiger King hizo de usted?

translation.en: This is not a documentary.
translation.es: Esto no es un documental.

translation.en: Not a documentary.
translation.es: No es un documental.

translation.en: It's fake. It's a silly fake show.
translation.es: Es falso. Es un espectáculo tonto y falso.

translation.en: An incredible wild ride of a fanticiful tale.
translation.es: Un viaje salvajede una historia fantasiosa. UNA SERIE DOCUMENTAL DE NETFLIX

translation.en: [John Reinke] Doc Antle hated Tiger King.
translation.es: Doc Antle odiaba Tiger King.

translation.en: He thought he was misrepresented in a bunch of lies.
translation.es: Su imagen fue distorsionadapor las mentiras.

translation.en: [Doc] They hid the fact that this facility
translation.es: Ocultaron que este centroes el Ritz-Carlton para felinos grandes.

translation.en: is the Ritz-Carlton of keeping big cats.
translation.es: Ocultaron que este centroes el Ritz-Carlton para felinos grandes. FUNDADOR Y DIRECTOR

translation.en: No one's even close to the grandeur and beauty of this facility.
translation.es: Nadie se acerca a la grandezay belleza de este centro.

translation.en: [Joe Exotic] It's an illusion. He creates an illusion for people to believe.
translation.es: Es una ilusión. Él crea una ilusiónpara que la gente la crea.

translation.en: I haven't spoke to Doc since this came out but he's not happy about it.
translation.es: No he hablado con Docdesde que esto se supo, pero no está contento.

translation.en: [Barbara Fisher] Doc is a very skilled con artist.
translation.es: Doc es un estafador muy hábil.

translation.en: He thinks that he's smarter than the rest of the world
translation.es: Cree que es más inteligenteque el resto del mundo

translation.en: and he designs his environment around him to confirm that.
translation.es: y arma su entorno para que así lo parezca.

translation.en: [Barbara] He creates his own truth always.
translation.es: Siempre crea su propia verdad.

translation.en: [Barbara] He doesn't live in a world where people challenge him.
translation.es: La gente de su mundo no lo desafía.

translation.en: He doesn't-- He's not used to that anymore.
translation.es: Ya no está acostumbrado a eso.

translation.en: The silly little girl Barbara Fisher, that bitch is on there talking, saying,
translation.es: Pero esa niña tonta, Barbara Fisher,esa maldita está diciendo:

translation.en: "They forced me to get a boob job after a month." Like, are you mad?
translation.es: "Me obligaron a operarme los senosdespués de un mes". ¿Estás loca?

translation.en: She was obsessed with having boobs.
translation.es: Estaba obsesionada con tener senos.

translation.en: Those boobs didn't live here, she's living out there,
translation.es: Esas tetas no vivían aquí,ella vive allá afuera,

translation.en: test driving them on every Tom, Dick, and Harry she can find.
translation.es: las prueba con cada Tom,Dick y Harry que se encuentra.

translation.en: -That's why she's pregnant all the time. -Oh, fuck.
translation.es: - Por eso siempre está embarazada.- Rayos.

translation.en: In terms of what he said about me, it's pure misogyny, that's what it is.
translation.es: En cuanto a lo que dijo de mí,es todo pura misoginia.

translation.en: [Barbara] Since Tiger King, we had people coming by the house, recognizing the dog.
translation.es: Desde Tiger King, vino gentea la casa y reconoció al perro.

translation.en: Just the fact that everybody probably could figure out where I lived
translation.es: El hecho de que todos supieran dónde vivía

translation.en: and that means Doc knew where I lived.
translation.es: significa que Doc sabía dónde vivía.

translation.en: That was scary to me, so we just went out into the deep country
translation.es: Eso me aterró,así que nos adentramos en el campo

translation.en: and that's where we remain.
translation.es: y ahí nos quedamos.

translation.en: [Barbara] Doc has gotten away with this for so long, he thinks he's bulletproof.
translation.es: Doc hizo lo que quisodurante mucho tiempo, se cree invencible.

translation.en: But after Tiger King, all these people contacted me with their own stories.
translation.es: Después de Tiger King, estas personasme contactaron con sus propias historias.

translation.en: I knew that if I came forward, other people would too.
translation.es: Sabía que, si yo hablaba,otras personas también lo harían.

translation.en: [Barbara] There is safety in numbers.
translation.es: La unión hace la fuerza.

translation.en: [Barbara] Maybe he doesn't think that you'll look back into his past.
translation.es: Y tal vez no creaque analizaremos su pasado.

translation.en: But what's going on with Doc won't survive in sunlight.
translation.es: Lo que pasa con Doc no puede seguir.

translation.en: [guide] Good morning! It's nice and warm today, isn't it?
translation.es: ¡Buenos días! Hoy hace calor, ¿no?

translation.en: -[crowd] Yeah! -[guide] Just a couple rules on it.
translation.es: Solo un par de reglas.

translation.en: No cameras are going to be allowed at all today.
translation.es: No se permitirán cámaras hoy.

translation.en: This is your final warning.
translation.es: Es su última advertencia.

translation.en: If we see recording or taking pictures, you will be asked to leave.
translation.es: Si los vemos grabando o tomando fotos,tendrán que irse.

translation.en: I'm Dr. Bhagavan Antle, director here at Myrtle Beach Safari.
translation.es: Soy el Dr. Bhagavan Antle,director de Myrtle Beach Safari.

translation.en: Myrtle Beach Safari is an incredible wildlife encounter
translation.es: Es un increíble encuentrocon la vida salvaje,

translation.en: where you get to have an up-close, interactive experience
translation.es: donde puedes viviruna experiencia interactiva

translation.en: with a variety of incredible exotic animals
translation.es: con una variedad de animales exóticos,

translation.en: up-close, uncaged and unbelievable interaction.
translation.es: sin jaulas, en una interacción increíble.

translation.en: A handful of people in the world get to have an eagle living in your house.
translation.es: Pocas personas en el mundotienen un águila viviendo en su casa,

translation.en: Sitting on the glove watching Game of Thrones.
translation.es: posada en su guanteviendo contigo Juego de tronos.

translation.en: That doesn't happen a whole lot for a lot of people.
translation.es: Eso no le pasa a mucha gente.

translation.en: When I was 12 years old, I got a photo taken in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.
translation.es: A los 12 años me tomaron una fotoen Myrtle Beach, Carolina del Sur.

translation.en: I looked at my mom and said, "This is what I want to do for the rest of my life."
translation.es: Miré a mi mamá y dije:"Esto quiero hacer el resto de mi vida".

translation.en: And when senior year came around, I called up Doc Antle and I said,
translation.es: Y cuando llegó el último año de escuela,llamé a Doc Antle y le dije:

translation.en: "Please let me come volunteer for you,"
translation.es: "Déjame ser voluntaria contigo",

translation.en: and he said, "Well, how soon can you move here?"
translation.es: y él dijo: "¿Cuándo puedes mudarte aquí?".

translation.en: And it was like I'd gotten the golden ticket for American Idol.
translation.es: Y fue como si hubiera recibidoel boleto dorado de American Idol.

translation.en: I'm like, "Ah! Okay."
translation.es: Dije: "Ah, muy bien".

translation.en: [Jewels] I worked for Doc Antle for seven years.
translation.es: Trabajé para Doc Antle durante siete años.

translation.en: My parents were actually really happy that I was doing something that I believed I wanted to do.
translation.es: Mis padres estaban felicesde que hiciera algo que creía que quería.

translation.en: I don't think they realized what I was really signing up for,
translation.es: Creo que no sabían lo que me esperaba:

translation.en: which is just 24/7 working at a place that I can't really leave.
translation.es: trabajar las 24 horas, siete díasa la semana, y no podía dejar el lugar.

translation.en: Barbara was the first person to come and talk to me.
translation.es: Barbara fue la primera que me habló.

translation.en: Me and Barb focused a lot on training little cubs to become walking adolescents.
translation.es: Barb y yo entrenábamos cachorroshasta que se hacían adolescentes.

translation.en: We would go to this place called Barefoot Landing every day,
translation.es: Íbamos a diario a un lugarllamado Barefoot Landing,

translation.en: and we would do photos with tiger cubs and big cats.
translation.es: y hacíamos fotos con cachorrosde tigre y grandes felinos.

translation.en: [Shavit Perel] One summer, I went to call a friend of mine in Myrtle Beach,
translation.es: Un verano llaméa un amigo en Myrtle Beach,

translation.en: and he offered me a job operating a climbing wall in Barefoot Landing.
translation.es: y me ofreció un trabajo en un murode escalada en Barefoot Landing.

translation.en: [Shavit] As the summer went on, I started developing relationships
translation.es: En el transcurso del verano,empecé a entablar relaciones

translation.en: with the people that worked at Preservation Station.
translation.es: con gente en la Estación de Conservación.

translation.en: It started with Barbara, and then it was China.
translation.es: Comenzó con Barbara y luego fue China.

translation.en: Everybody looked like Crocodile Dundee.
translation.es: Todos parecían Cocodrilo Dundee.

translation.en: And everybody was tan and blond and had a knife
translation.es: Todos estaban bronceados,eran rubios y tenían un cuchillo,

translation.en: and it was really impressive.
translation.es: y era realmente impresionante.

translation.en: And then eventually Doc would show up.
translation.es: Y luego Doc aparecía.

translation.en: He just blew me away.
translation.es: Me impresionó.

translation.en: By the time we reached the end of summer, he said, "How about you come work for me?"
translation.es: A fines del verano, dijo:"¿Qué tal si vienes a trabajar para mí?".

translation.en: I said, "I'm in."
translation.es: Dije: "Acepto".

translation.en: I stayed at the barn where the elephant was living.
translation.es: Me quedé en el granerodonde vivía el elefante.

translation.en: So I would go to sleep with Bubbles and I would wake up with Bubbles.
translation.es: Así que me iba a dormir con Bubblesy me despertaba con Bubbles.

translation.en: Who the heck am I to be lucky enough to be in this position?
translation.es: ¿Quién soy para tener la suertede estar en esta situación?

translation.en: And then they would give me those clothes, and I got my knife.
translation.es: Luego me dieron esa ropay yo tenía mi cuchillo.

translation.en: Now I'm looking like Crocodile Dundee, right?
translation.es: Ahora parezco Cocodrilo Dundee.

translation.en: I'm the cool guy.
translation.es: Soy el tipo genial.

translation.en: And it got to the point, like, I'm living a dream.
translation.es: Parecía que estaba viviendo un sueño.

translation.en: But everything completely turned on its head once Julie came into the picture.
translation.es: Pero todo cambiócuando Julie entró en escena.

translation.en: I'm talking to Doc and he goes,
translation.es: Hablo con Doc y dice:

translation.en: "I just want to let you know, there's a couple of new girls."
translation.es: "Quiero que sepasque hay un par de chicas nuevas.

translation.en: "I don't want you getting involved."
translation.es: No te involucres con ellas".

translation.en: Somebody told me, "Hey, Doc rated you a nine."
translation.es: Alguien me dijo:"Oye, Doc te puso un nueve".

translation.en: Part of me was like, "Oh, yeah," and then part of me is like, "What?"
translation.es: Parte de mí dijo: "Sí",y otra parte dijo: "¿Qué?".

translation.en: [Magenta Brooks] Women and men at Doc's compound were treated very differently.
translation.es: Las mujeres y los hombres del centroeran tratados de forma distinta.

translation.en: He definitely showed off his giant bed a few more times than was necessary
translation.es: Me mostró su cama gigantemás veces de lo necesario

translation.en: to do with an employee.
translation.es: para una empleada.

translation.en: I had always wondered if I had misread things,
translation.es: Siempre me pregunté si malinterpreté todo.

translation.en: and then seeing Tiger King and hearing Barbara talk, it was so cathartic.
translation.es: Pero ver Tiger Kingy escuchar hablar a Barbara fue liberador.

translation.en: It was just this amazing confirmation that I didn't make this up,
translation.es: Fue una confirmación increíblede que no lo inventé,

translation.en: and other people saw it too. [sighs]
translation.es: y otras personas también lo vieron.

translation.en: [Magenta] I am a polyamory relationship coach
translation.es: Soy guía de relaciones poliamorosas

translation.en: and I've been noticing that people keep talking about Doc as being polyamorous.
translation.es: y he notado que la gentedice que Doc es poliamoroso.

translation.en: Polyamory requires respect that flows both ways.
translation.es: El poliamor requiere respetoque fluye en ambos sentidos.

translation.en: It requires autonomy.
translation.es: Requiere de autonomía.

translation.en: And Doc is not encouraging his partners
translation.es: Y Doc no alienta a sus parejas

translation.en: to create healthy relationships outside of him.
translation.es: a crear relaciones saludables fuera de él.

translation.en: -It's a harem, it's not polyamory. -[cryptic music plays]
translation.es: Es un harén, no es poliamor.

translation.en: [Doc] I have my three beloved partners who've been with me for 20 years each.
translation.es: Tengo a mis tres queridas compañerasque han estado conmigo durante 20 años.

translation.en: My son, my three daughters.
translation.es: Mi hijo, mis tres hijas.

translation.en: And that group of people, along with the peripheral characters around them,
translation.es: A ese grupo de personas,junto con todos los que los acompañan

translation.en: love doing this and plan on to continue to do it.
translation.es: les encanta hacer estoy planean seguir haciéndolo.

translation.en: So if I move to the Himalayan Mountains today,
translation.es: Si me mudo a las montañas del Himalaya,

translation.en: those guys should be able to step up and run some facsimile of it.
translation.es: ellos pueden dirigir todode forma idéntica.

translation.en: [Magenta] He's got this very highly overinflated sense of self. He sees himself as kind of a guru.
translation.es: Tiene una idea exagerada de sí mismo.Se considera un gurú.

translation.en: And so, having followers or having animals that are subservient to him
translation.es: Así que, tener seguidoreso animales que le sirvan

translation.en: kind of bolsters that narrative.
translation.es: refuerza ese concepto.

translation.en: [Barbara] After we all changed our names, he gave a bunch of us different chains.
translation.es: Después de cambiarnos los nombres,nos dio cadenas diferentes.

translation.en: The medallion signified to all of us
translation.es: El medallón significaba para todos

translation.en: this union of us all being one family.
translation.es: estar unidos como una familia.

translation.en: It's a symbol for the integral yoga that Swami Satchidananda purported.
translation.es: Es un símbolo del yoga integralque Swami Satchidananda pretendía.

translation.en: He was the guru that opened Woodstock.
translation.es: Fue el gurú que abrió Woodstock.

translation.en: A picture of the big bearded guy going, "Let's start."
translation.es: El tipo con barba diciendo: "Empecemos".

translation.en: That's Swami Satchidananda.
translation.es: Es Swami Satchidananda.

translation.en: [Doc] Tons of famous people are longtime devotees.
translation.es: Muchos famosos son devotosdesde hace mucho.

translation.en: [Barbara] He met Swamiji Satchidananda in Yogaville.
translation.es: Conoció a Swamiji Satchidanandaen Yogaville.

translation.en: [Barbara] All these people devoted to Swamiji and listening to everything he says,
translation.es: Toda esa gente era devota de Swamiji,le hacían caso en todo

translation.en: and basing every aspect of their life around him.
translation.es: y basaban cada aspecto de su vida en él.

translation.en: [Barbara] If there's somebody he idolized, it's Swamiji.
translation.es: SWAMI SATCHIDANANDA Y DOC ANTLE Si idolatra a alguien, es a Swamiji.

translation.en: The way he talks about him, it's beyond hero worship.
translation.es: Su forma de hablar de élva más allá del culto al héroe.

translation.en: [man] How did you go from Yogaville to being a--
translation.es: ¿Cómo pasaste de Yogaville a ser…?

translation.en: [Doc] Once you add Yogaville,
translation.es: Al llegar a Yogaville,

translation.en: you're dropping in this incredibly complicated,
translation.es: entras en un culto muy complicado,

translation.en: cult-ridden, strange entity, like, "What?"
translation.es: entras en un culto muy complicado, sumamente extraño que te asombra.

translation.en: [female voice] The Reverend Sri Swami Satchidananda
translation.es: El reverendo Sri Swami Satchidananda

translation.en: experienced the spiritual oneness of all creation
translation.es: experimentó la unidad espiritualde toda la creación,

translation.en: and dreamed of creating a shrine where that oneness could be seen and felt.
translation.es: soñó con crear un santuariodonde esa unidad pudiera verse y sentirse.

translation.en: Swami Satchidananda used to always laughingly say
translation.es: Swami Satchidanandasiempre decía jocosamente

translation.en: that the yoga institutes were asylums and we were all the inmates.
translation.es: que los institutos de yoga eran manicomiosy todos éramos los pacientes.

translation.en: And people would go, "Ha-ha-ha. That's so funny, Swamiji."
translation.es: Y la gente decía: "Qué gracioso, Swamiji".

translation.en: But it was true. -We were having crisis times. -[tense music plays]
translation.es: Pero era cierto. Era una época de crisis.

translation.en: People were choosing between yoga and Scientology, and I thought,
translation.es: La gente elegía entre el yogay la cienciología, y yo pensaba:

translation.en: "I wasn't raised by wolves. I am going to go with yoga."
translation.es: "No soy salvaje. Voy a hacer yoga".

translation.en: [Satchidananda] Everywhere there seems to be the cry.
translation.es: En todas partes se escucha ese grito.

translation.en: We hear people shouting in the name of peace,
translation.es: Escuchamos a gentegritar en nombre de la paz,

translation.en: but they want to fight for peace.
translation.es: pero que quiere luchar por la paz.

translation.en: Most of the people at Yogaville are loving, caring individuals,
translation.es: La mayoría de la gente de Yogavilleson personas buenas y afectuosas

translation.en: who want to better themselves spiritually and want to better the world.
translation.es: que quieren mejorar espiritualmentey hacer un mundo mejor.

translation.en: [female voice] Yogaville is an intentional community where people choose to live together
translation.es: Yogaville es una comunidad intencional,donde la gente elige vivir junta,

translation.en: practicing yoga, vegetarian diet, meditation.
translation.es: practicar yoga,llevar una dieta vegetariana, meditar.

translation.en: There's probably close to 250 permanent residents.
translation.es: Probablemente haycerca de 250 residentes permanentes.

translation.en: My parents met Swami Satchidananda when I was five years old,
translation.es: Mis papás conocieron a Swami Satchidanandacuando yo tenía cinco años,

translation.en: and I started meditating myself when I was 11, by choice.
translation.es: y comencé a meditar a los 11,por elección.

translation.en: I was doing, I don't know, four to six hours a day of yoga and meditation, yeah.
translation.es: Hacía de cuatro a seis horasal día de yoga y meditación.

translation.en: We were a very peaceful, loving, accepting…
translation.es: Éramos una comunidad muy pacífica,amorosa y tolerante.

translation.en: [female voice] People believe Swami Satchidananda is a god.
translation.es: La gente creeque Swami Satchidananda es un dios.

translation.en: -A Jesus Christ. He can do no wrong. -[gentle music plays]
translation.es: Un Jesucristo,que no puede hacer nada malo.

translation.en: They would drop to the ground when he walked into the room and bow to his feet.
translation.es: Se arrojaban al suelo cuando él entrabay se inclinaban.

translation.en: Kiss his feet.
translation.es: Besaban sus pies.

translation.en: [Sachi] I watched Tiger King, and I was like, "Damn." "They don't even know the story before that."
translation.es: Vi Tiger King y pensé:"No conocen la historia anterior".

translation.en: Doc Antle got ideas from Swami Satchidananda.
translation.es: Doc Antle sacó ideasde Swami Satchidananda.

translation.en: He was attracted to the power that he wielded over other people.
translation.es: Se sentía atraído por el poderque ejercía sobre otras personas.

translation.en: Bhagavan was a very well-known character at Yogaville.
translation.es: Bhagavan era un personajemuy conocido en Yogaville.

translation.en: Swami Satchidananda loved him. He was, you know, lots of flash.
translation.es: Swami Satchidananda lo amaba. Llamaba mucho la atención.

translation.en: He had Bubbles, the little baby elephant.
translation.es: Tenía a Bubbles, el pequeño elefante bebé.

translation.en: He was like a celebrity there.
translation.es: Parecía una celebridad.

translation.en: [female announcer] Bhagavan Antle of Bhagavan's Celestial Magic.
translation.es: Bhagavan Antlede Magia Celestial Bhagavan.

translation.en: [Joan] He was the cute boy of the '80s. He had long dark hair, a mustache.
translation.es: Era el chico lindo de los 80.Tenía el pelo largo y oscuro, un bigote.

translation.en: He was a magic man.
translation.es: Era un hechicero.

translation.en: [Steven Diamond] The two of us had an instant connection through magic.
translation.es: Tuvimos una conexión instantáneaa través de la magia.

translation.en: I was about 15 or 16.
translation.es: Tenía unos 15 o 16 años.

translation.en: I had my own career at that time, so I was doing fairs and festivals.
translation.es: Tenía mi propia carrera entonces,así que hacía ferias y festivales.

translation.en: And I was very popular all up and down the East Coast.
translation.es: Y era muy popular en toda la Costa Este.

translation.en: Bhagavan saw me as a great way to make some money.
translation.es: Bhagavan me viocomo una gran manera de ganar dinero.

translation.en: [Steven] And so, right away we kind of formed this little informal partnership.
translation.es: Así que enseguida formamosuna pequeña sociedad informal.

translation.en: A 50/50 plan was the deal.
translation.es: El plan era compartir las ganancias.

translation.en: [Steven] Come down, guys! Run!
translation.es: ¡Vengan, chicos! ¡Corran!

translation.en: [Steven] He had this place called The Buckingham Zoological Park.
translation.es: Tenía un lugar llamadoEl Zoológico de Buckingham

translation.en: Right outside of Yogaville.
translation.es: justo en las afueras de Yogaville.

translation.en: You'd drive down this little country road and you wouldn't know that it was there
translation.es: Si ibas por el pequeño camino rural,pasaba desapercibido

translation.en: unless you knew exactly how to find it.
translation.es: a menos que supieras cómo encontrarlo.

translation.en: You walked through the little gate and you see this A-frame house.
translation.es: Entrabas por la pequeña puertay veías esta casa en forma de A.

translation.en: It kind of looked like something a hobbit might live in.
translation.es: Parecía una casa de hobbit.

translation.en: And immediately, as soon as you walked in, you could see an elephant in the distance,
translation.es: Y, de inmediato, en cuanto entrabas,podías ver un elefante a lo lejos,

translation.en: and you could see tigers back there, you could see lions.
translation.es: y podías ver tigres y leones atrás.

translation.en: Good boy.
translation.es: Buen chico.

translation.en: [Steven] In the beginning, it was such a great place.
translation.es: Al principio, era un gran lugar.

translation.en: What I liked about the Buckingham Zoo was the community that Bhagavan had built.
translation.es: Lo que me gustódel Zoológico de Buckingham fue la comunidad que Bhagavan construyó.

translation.en: [man] I met Bhagavan right out of high school.
translation.es: Conocí a Bhagavanal salir del bachillerato.

translation.en: He would do local shows around here for schools.
translation.es: Hacía espectáculos localespara las escuelas.

translation.en: And then I worked with him at the Renaissance Festival.
translation.es: Trabajé con élen el Festival Renacentista.

translation.en: [David] I made my living as a juggler for like 25 or 30 years.
translation.es: Me gané la vida como malabaristadurante 25 o 30 años.

translation.en: [David] I'm sort of an entrepreneur.
translation.es: Soy una especie de empresario.

translation.en: I had a video business
translation.es: Tenía un negocio de filmación

translation.en: and I used to videotape his magic show that he would perform.
translation.es: y filmaba su show de magia.

translation.en: By the constant practice of the control of the life force,
translation.es: Con la práctica constantedel control de la fuerza vital,

translation.en: you will not only be able to control the life force of your mind and body,
translation.es: no solo podrás controlar la fuerza vitalde tu mente y tu cuerpo,

translation.en: you will also be able to control the life force of the universe, as well.
translation.es: también podrás controlarla fuerza vital del universo.

translation.en: [David] Bhagavan supposedly had psychic powers
translation.es: Bhagavan, supuestamente,tenía poderes psíquicos

translation.en: because he had practiced yoga and his pranayama and acquired
translation.es: porque había practicado yoga, pranayama y había adquirido esos superpoderes.

translation.en: these superpowers.
translation.es: y había adquirido esos superpoderes.

translation.en: He would walk on coals and he would supposedly levitate things and whatnot.
translation.es: Caminaba sobre carbón,supuestamente levitaba cosas y demás.

translation.en: Your body can become so fit
translation.es: Tu cuerpo puede ponerse tan en forma

translation.en: that you are immune to the outside world coming in and influencing you.
translation.es: que eres inmune a la influenciadel mundo exterior.

translation.en: [Steven] He would create this illusion
translation.es: Él creó la ilusión

translation.en: that if you listened to him and you followed his ways,

translation.en: [Sachi] Swami Satchidananda told me directly.
translation.es: Swami Satchidanandame lo dijo de forma directa.

translation.en: He was like, "You're a rotten apple."
translation.es: Me dijo: "Eres una manzana podrida.

translation.en: "You're going to make the other shiny, bright apples rotten, too."
translation.es: Harás que las otras manzanas relucientestambién se pudran".

translation.en: [Sachi] Being excommunicated and shunned was painful.
translation.es: Ser excomulgada y rechazada fue doloroso.

translation.en: My whole world was Yogaville. I didn't know anything else.
translation.es: Todo mi mundo era Yogaville.No conocía nada más.

translation.en: Yogaville failed our kids
translation.es: Yogaville les falló a nuestros hijos

translation.en: by not taking a stand.
translation.es: al no adoptar una postura firme.

translation.en: By the time I got pregnant,
translation.es: Para cuando quedé embarazada,

translation.en: he was already in a relationship with another 14-year-old.
translation.es: él ya tenía una relacióncon otra chica de 14 años.

translation.en: Once you've married a 14-year-old… [scoffs]
translation.es: Si te casas con una chica de 14 años,

translation.en: …what could possibly…
translation.es: ¿qué podría…

translation.en: hold you back?
translation.es: detenerte?

translation.en: [Radha Hirsch] Never in a million years
translation.es: Ni en un millón de años

translation.en: did I ever think I would be sharing this story publicly. [laughs]
translation.es: hubiera imaginado que compartiríaesta historia públicamente.

translation.en: When I hear myself, I'm like, "Wow, it is pretty crazy."
translation.es: Cuando me escucho, digo:"Vaya, es una locura".

translation.en: I was 14 and he was 25.
translation.es: Yo tenía 14 años y él 25.

translation.en: My mom was wanting me to realize how inappropriate the situation was.
translation.es: Mi mamá quería que me diera cuentade lo inapropiada que era la situación.

translation.en: And I remember him saying,
translation.es: Y recuerdo que él dijo:

translation.en: "Don't worry, we're going to deal with it. It's all going to work out."
translation.es: "No te preocupes, lo solucionaremos.Todo saldrá bien.

translation.en: "Don't worry. We're going to be together."
translation.es: No te preocupes. Estaremos juntos".

translation.en: Bhagavan and I were talking on the phone
translation.es: Bhagavan y yo hablamos por teléfono

translation.en: and he wanted me to give him very specifically my route to school.
translation.es: y quería que le dierami ruta de la escuela.

translation.en: We went over it and over it, and he came and pulled up next to me
translation.es: Lo repasamos una y otra vez,él llegó y se detuvo junto a mí,

translation.en: in a disguise of some sort.
translation.es: traía una especie de disfraz.

translation.en: He looked bizarre, like all the hair up in a hat and like, crazy funky glasses.
translation.es: Se veía raro, con el cabello recogidoen un sombrero y lentes extravagantes.

translation.en: And I jump in the car, I dumped my book bags in a dumpster
translation.es: Me subí al auto,tiré mi mochila en un basurero

translation.en: and we flew off.
translation.es: y nos fuimos volando.

translation.en: In my mind, I ran away, yes, but I still, kind of, wasn't thinking
translation.es: En mi mente, hui, sí, pero no pensaba

translation.en: that it was really an abduction.
translation.es: que fuera un secuestro. ¿VISTE A ESTA PERSONA?POLICÍA DE SANTA MÓNICA
